item.title: A good way to improve writing
item.description: Many faces of the writing Writing can be for many purposes and they are all different. For a story writing or an anecdote, you have many adjectives for different things. For analytical essay, you have many judgements and reasoning words to piece up the logic. And for academic journal writing, you want to have plain language and fluent logic. â€‹ It is very interesting that in academic writing, you both want to avoid jargon and use jargon.
